ChestSMBenchPress.name: Smith Bench Press
ChestSMBenchPress.preparation: Lie supine on bench with chest under bar. Grasp bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back.
ChestSMBenchPress.execution: Lower weight to chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.
ChestSMBenchPress.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide. Also see Bench Press Analysis.

ChestSMDeclineBenchPress.name: Smith Decline Bench Press
ChestSMDeclineBenchPress.preparation: Lie supine on decline bench with feet under leg brace and chest under bar. Grasp bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back.
ChestSMDeclineBenchPress.execution: Lower weight to chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.
ChestSMDeclineBenchPress.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide. Latissimus Dorsi involvement is low on Decline Bench Press (Barnett 1995). Also see Bench Press Analysis.
